title: Building an Off-the-Shelf System for Vaccine Safety to Address Emerging Issues
cleaned_text: Oct 5, 2022 | 1:30pm - 2:30pm Building an Off-the-Shelf System for Vaccine Safety to Address Emerging Issues Join a webinar on vaccine safety surveillance on October 5, 2022, from 1:30 - 2:30pm ET! This webinar is co-hosted by the University of Toronto's Centre for Vaccine Preventable Diseases (CVPD) at the Dalla Lana School of Public Health and the Canadian Association for Immunization Research, Evaluation and Education (CAIRE). Monitoring vaccine safety is an essential part of public health surveillance. In this webinar, the speakers will discuss the design and implementation vaccine safety surveillance systems for existing and new vaccines. Both the Canadian National Vaccine Safety (CANVAS) Network and the Global Vaccine Data Network (GVDN) will be
